title: Can The Tories Win Back London? (with Shaun Bailey)
itunes:title: Can The Tories Win Back London? (with Shaun Bailey)
description:
Sadiq Khan has not delivered for Londoners, according to Shaun Bailey, the Conservative candidate for London Mayor. Speaking to Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek, he accuses Khan of failing to deliver on knife crime, transport and housing. But what is Bailey offering Londoners?

Plus, Bloomberg's David Merritt discusses the government's plans to slash unskilled immigration, and Alex Morales looks at those still hoping Britain will stay closely aligned to the EU.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
